author: gnodet
msg: Improve integration in jboss / petals by
- adding a shared library with all servicemix-core dependencies (need to improve that, but ...)
- remove dependencies in bootstraps (SL are not available at this time)
- catching some dummy NoSuchMethodOperation when calling getNamingContext and getTransactionManager on petals
Though petals integration does not work due to linkage errors when deploying SA.
Not sure how they implemented their classloaders, but i guess they are bugged somehow ...
